name: The Westin San Francisco Airport

reviews.text: Stayed one night for a business trip in July. The stay was completely acceptable but no feature/service was distinguishable. My room was clean and orderly - with the exception of a full hand print on the desk glass top. The gym was on the small side and was full at 5:30am. The breakfast buffet was fine, with food selection typical of most hotel BF buffets. Airport noise was not a problem for a light sleeper.
reviews.title: Acceptable stay at this Westin

reviews.text: Quick, easy check in
reviews.title: Quick Overnight

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Room Was quiet and clean
reviews.title: Super Comfort

reviews.text: Thought the coffee shop was a bit expensive
reviews.title: Grungy and LOUD

reviews.text: Convenient to airport
reviews.title: Not worth the money!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: With the start of the check in with the SPG Gold desk not open things were not looking good. But things quickly turned around. The room was clean and spacious with everything working.
reviews.title: A Great Stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Breakfast in the restaurant was good and included in our rate. A glance the a la carte menu shocked me with $4.00 coffee!
reviews.title: Great overnight spot for an SFO layover

reviews.text: Free High speed internet for Gold members would be nice.
reviews.title: Nice place if you can find a reasonable price

reviews.text: Will stay here again.
reviews.title: I agree it's not worth the price!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We spent the night here during a stop-over in San Francisco on our way to Asia.Our experience was that the front desk was polite when we arrived late (we were re-routed due to storms in Chicago),and we left late the next morning. The décor of our room was standard Westin fare, which we find to be tasteful, high-quality, and inoffensive. The room seemed to have been recently renovated/standardized, and it was clean.
reviews.title: Convenient and Comfortable for a Quick Stay

reviews.text: I stayed for one night and am completely satisfied with my stay: service was prompt and friendly, everything was clean, the food delicious, and the location is a plus (walking distance to the train). I'll definitely be back.
reviews.title: Outstanding
comfortable
reviews.text: i was here for a one week business trip so my needs were not high - clean and safe. i agree with the posts that say this is not up to the standard of other westins. i think this is because it is a converted building, hence the size of the rooms. however, that said, the room was clean, quiet ( apart from the roar of the jets taking off from 6 am to midnight) and the bed was, indeed, heavenly. net-net, quite adequate for a business trip

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My main purpose for staying at this hotel is because I just needed one night after landing at San Francisco. I was heading out the following day. I needed to pick up a car from the airport, so the Westin was a good choice, since it is very close to the airport.
reviews.title: Great location - close to airport

reviews.text: The hotel on the outside is a little dated, but the inside is nice. It is what you expect from a Westin.
reviews.title: This is Why IM a Hilton Honors Member

reviews.text: A nice thing is the park across the street by the water. If you are an airplane watcher, you have a great view of the SFO runway and the planes taking off and landing.
reviews.title: Good Service but Room Not Westin Quality

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I read the recent reviews just to see how people's experience with the hotel compared to mine. I wasn't going to write a review (I already have reviewed it last year) if reviews were similar to what I had experienced but it seems like there's some really horrible reviews out there that I wanted to clear the air at least with my review.
reviews.title: Very convenient location and always enjoy my stay here.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Overall I would say that I had a very good stay there. This is my 3rd stay with them and I stay there whenever I have a short trip in the SFO area. Perhaps I don't have high expectation for hotels near the airport. I do recall my first visit there and I was surprised at how average the room looked especially for a Westin. But the heavenly bed was great and the dual shower head was amazing so I couldn't be happier with that so that's what keeps me coming back (also the AAA rate is good).
reviews.title: Not worth the price

reviews.text: The staff was great as well. The front desk (Diane) was very nice and helpful. She instantly recognized my platinum status and although we didn't get upgraded to a suite, she gave us complimentary breakfast vouchers in the hotel restaurant so that was nice enough since we had an early flight out and no time to eat elsewhere.
reviews.title: Even a Motel Six Would Have Been Better

reviews.text: The restaurant staff was great. They were quick to seat and serve us, which was a plus since we were in a hurry. The breakfast buffet selection was fresh and delicious. The selection of freshly cut fruit was amazing since it's usually not that great in buffets.
reviews.title: An overpriced dump

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Upon reading people's poor reviews, I would suggest joining SPG and perhaps you will get a better room or at least try to request. For cheaper rates, look into the hotel offers tab from their websites. I usually use the AAA rate, which sometimes includes breakfast or parking at a pretty good rate.
reviews.title: love the westin

aka: The Westin San Francisco Airport Hotel
description: Designed with your unique needs in mind, The Westin San Francisco Airport offers business travelers easy access to the city and Silicon Valley via major freeways and public transport. Less than .5 mile away from San Francisco International Airport, we offer a free shuttle to and from the airport.
